t:parameter.name: TargetPort
t:parameter.description: Port used by the RDP service

t:parameter.name: NetworkTimeout
t:parameter.description: Timeout for blocking network calls (in seconds). Use -1 for no timeout.

t:parameter.name: MaxProcessCount
t:parameter.description: The maximum number of RDP process loops to allow

t:parameter.name: SendSpacebar
t:parameter.description: Whether to send spacebar to clear legal text caption or not

t:parameter.name: ProcessCountToSendSpaceOn
t:parameter.description: Process loop to clear the legal text caption on

t:parameter.name: MaxRDPLibErrorCount
t:parameter.description: Maximum number of RDPLib errors to allow

t:parameter.name: Architecture
t:parameter.description: Type of processor the target is running on

t:parameter.name: Target
t:parameter.description: Operating system and service pack of the target

t:parameter.name: EncryptionMethod
t:parameter.description: Encryption method the target is running

t:parameter.name: SmartCardAuth
t:parameter.description: If the target supports smart card authentication

t:parameter.name: RdpLibHertz
t:parameter.description: Extrapolated RdpLib processing cycles per second.

t:parameter.name: Contract
t:parameter.description: The contract fulfilled by this plugin
